NewsArticle.Title: Dark Ages Chat on Planet Dark Ages Friday!
NewsArticle.Content: The date for the chat is Friday, April 18th 2003 at 3:30 PST. You can access the chat by clicking the link at the top of PDA entitled "PDA Live Chat". If you are using an IRC client such as mIRC, you may connect with the following information: Server: irc.xenobyte.net (use pda.ath.cx if you cannot connect to irc.xenobyte.net) Port: 6667 Channel: #PlanetDA For more details, visit Planet Dark Ages here!
